items.desc: Extract PDFs from Procore zip exports and route to project discipline folders. Handle revision superseding.

items.title: Batch WPQ/WPS Extraction
items.desc: Extract ~500 welding PDFs from D:\RAW_DATA\ using dual Sonnet + Opus shadow review pipeline.

items.title: Quality Manual Module 3 XML Authoring
items.desc: Author module3_output.xml from planning doc. 8 sections: Program Framework (3.1), Welding Quality (3.2), Training & Workforce (3.3), Testing & Calibration (3.4), CI/CAPA (3.5), Field Operations Manual (3.6), Vendor & Subcontractor Quality (3.7), Internal Audit (3.8).

items.title: Quality Manual Module 4 XML Authoring
items.desc: Author module4_output.xml from planning doc. ~50 SOPs across 11 categories with dual ID system (section 4.X + SOP-XXX-NNN). Reserved section ranges per category.

items.title: Windows Service (nssm)
items.desc: Run Waitress as auto-start Windows service instead of manual qms serve.

items.title: Scheduled OneDrive Sync
items.desc: Auto-run qms pipeline intake --sync on a schedule via Task Scheduler or service.

items.title: P-Number Prefix Disambiguation
items.desc: P- prefix maps to Mechanical but should be Plumbing for some projects. Need project-level override or smarter resolution.

items.title: Quality Manual PDF Export
items.desc: WeasyPrint-based PDF export for quality manual modules. Professional cover page, TOC with page numbers, all content block types, SIS branding. CLI (qms docs export), web download endpoint, and in-page PDF button. Customizable via standalone Jinja2+CSS template.

items.title: Contextualized Document Import — Workforce MVP
items.desc: 4-step import wizard (Upload → Map Columns → Review Action Plan → Execute) with shared import engine, workforce-specific specs (15 columns, 4-level match, separation detection), and full web UI. Dark mode hover contrast fix included.

items.title: UI Restructure: Time Tracker + Project Hub + Home Dashboard
items.desc: Major restructure: extracted Time Tracker module (admin-only), moved BU CRUD to Settings, added project hub detail pages, operational home dashboard with activity feed, linked users to employees, cleaned up EMP- numbering.

items.title: Scheduled Publishing for The Observatory
items.desc: Draft/scheduled/published workflow for blog posts. Datetime picker in editor, auto-publish on read (lazy), three-state badges, mutual exclusion between Published toggle and schedule picker.

items.title: Landing Page + The Observatory Blog
items.desc: Branded landing page with Navigator Penguin mascot, module quick-link cards, and The Observatory astronomy-themed blog. Blog admin in Settings. Markdown support.

items.title: 07609 Freshpet Full Drawing Extraction
items.desc: 286 sheets across 11 disciplines extracted via SIS pipeline. 72 equipment, 673 lines, 372 instruments. Cross-checker module created.

items.title: Pipeline Cross-Checker Module
items.desc: Reusable cross_checker.py for detecting material mismatches, size discrepancies, and duplicate tags across drawings.

items.title: Admin System Architecture Map
items.desc: Secret /admin/system-map page with live DB stats, full system visual, roadmap tracker.

items.title: Workforce Employee Sheet UI
items.desc: Web UI for viewing employee data from SIS imports.

items.title: Fillable WPQ PDF Extraction
items.desc: Form-field extraction for fillable WPQ PDFs using extraction pipeline.

items.title: SIS Import Employee Number Fix
items.desc: Preserve real employee numbers during SIS field location imports.

items.title: Welder Profile Archive/Restore
items.desc: Admin-only archive and restore button on welder profile pages.

items.title: Module 4 SOP Architecture Planning
items.desc: Comprehensive Module 4 architecture: 50 SOPs across 11 categories, dual ID system (4.X + SOP-XXX-NNN), reserved section ranges, standard XML template, cross-reference maps from M2/M3, 4-phase authoring plan.

items.title: Module 3 Quality Programs Architecture
items.desc: Expanded Module 3 from welding-only to 7 independent quality programs (3.2-3.8) with program framework (3.1). Bridge between M2 project procedures and M4 SOPs. Programs: Welding, Training, Testing & Calibration, CI/CAPA, Field Manual, Vendor Quality, Internal Audit.
